comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.0b9) Gecko/20110129 Firefox/4.0b9
Build Identifier: 4.0

When you first set up a bugzilla installation through the checksetup.pl, the real name is wrongly injected into the bugs.profiles table.

Ex:

Real name: Ozan Çağlayan

mysql> select userid,realname from profiles where login_name LIKE "%ozan%";
+--------+----------------------+
| userid | realname             |
+--------+----------------------+
|      1 | Ozan Ã‡aÄŸlayan      | <-- This is created within checksetup.pl
|      3 | Ozan Çağlayan        | <-- This is created through the Admin panel
+--------+----------------------+
2 rows in set (0.00 sec)



Reproducible: Always
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.0b9) Gecko/20110129 Firefox/4.0b9
Build Identifier: 4.0

When you first set up a bugzilla installation through the checksetup.pl, the real name is wrongly injected into the bugs.profiles table.

Ex:

Real name: Ozan Çağlayan

mysql> select userid,realname from profiles where login_name LIKE "%ozan%";
+--------+----------------------+
| userid | realname             |
+--------+----------------------+
|      1 | Ozan Ã‡aÄŸlayan      | <-- This is created within checksetup.pl
|      3 | Ozan Çağlayan        | <-- This is created through the Admin panel
+--------+----------------------+
2 rows in set (0.00 sec)



Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: ozan@pardus.org.tr
comments.author: ozan@pardus.org.tr
mkanat@bugzilla.org
comments.creator: mkanat@bugzilla.org
comments.raw_text: Interesting! What's the encoding used in your terminal?
comments.text: Interesting! What's the encoding used in your terminal?

comments.author: mkanat@bugzilla.org
comments.raw_text: Okay. It's possible that we're not setting the utf8 flag properly on STDIN.
comments.text: Okay. It's possible that we're not setting the utf8 flag properly on STDIN.
comments.creator: mkanat@bugzilla.org

comments.author: LpSolit@gmail.com
comments.creator: LpSolit@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: WFM using your real name with Bugzilla 4.1.1 and PostgreSQL 9.0.1.
comments.text: WFM using your real name with Bugzilla 4.1.1 and PostgreSQL 9.0.1.

comments.author: LpSolit@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
(In reply to Frédéric Buclin from comment #4)
> WFM using your real name with Bugzilla 4.1.1 and PostgreSQL 9.0.1.

Also WFM with Bugzilla 4.0.2 + 4.3 and MySQL 5.5.10. But I remember having seen this problem in the past (but I forgot with which version of Bugzilla). Leaving the bug open for now.
